Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Abadar Lore): Skill Expert (Abadar Lore)
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 5 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Skilled Human: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures on any trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master rank provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 38 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (4 max); trained) Class DC: Bard: 18 (charisma; trained)
Armor: Leather Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Crossbow (+7 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; trained); Greataxe (+5 1d12 S; strength; trained); Whip (+7 1d4 S; dexterity; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +6
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Bola as one category simpler
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 2; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 2
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation may substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Courageous Anthem (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Lingering Composition (O1 Foc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the duration of a subsequent cantrip composition to 3 rd, or 4 rd on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
Soothe (O1): (2) R30' Target regains 1d10+4 HP and gains +2 saves vs. mental effects for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +1d10+4 HP)
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Courageous Anthem occult spells/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Lingering Composition: Knows the Lingering Composition occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Maestro: Knows the Soothe occult spell
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 2 available vs. 4 allocated
Legendary Professional Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15 and lore rank (currently 2) >= 4
